Marbled Blueberry Bundt Cake

  • Desserts or Baked Goods
  • Fruit
  • Fruit Desserts
  • Cakes
By Dan Souza ï½¥ Appears in Cook's Illustrated May/June 2013, America's Test Kitchen TV

Tossing large, cultivated blueberries into a Bundt cake gave us big blue blowouts and little fresh flavor. We looked for a way to make the star of the show less of a problem.

A cookbook recipe exclusively for All-Access members from The Perfect Cake

SERVES 12

TIME 2Â¼ hours, plus 3 hours cooling
